member.name: T:mKit.CompositingMode
member.summary:
The following modes are defined: ALPHABLEND - alpha blending function with contrast enhancement RGBA - RGB with blending weight from alpha channel MIP - Maximum Intensity Projection STANDARD_TEXTURE - like ALPHABLEND, plus a texture as LUT CUSTOM_TEXTURE - a custom blending function, plus a texture as LUT (not yet implemented) VISIBLEHUMAN - builtin RGB transfer function See also which gets passed to GPU shader in .
DeveloperNote: when adding new modes, add name also to shader multi_compile line.

member.summary: Alpha blending of voxel colors (default)

member.name: P:mKit.Volume.VolumeDicom
member.summary: Transform of volume data with Dicom rotation applied. The Dicom patient-based reference coordinate system orients the volume data with +z going to the patient's head, +x to the patient's left and +y to the patient's back. Since the Dicom coordinate system is right-handed, but Unity left-handed, this transform lets the patients head point to minus z.
